statements: DELETE FROM transportation_data WHERE start_location='City A' AND passenger_count > 3;
DELETE FROM transportation_data WHERE start_location = 'New York' AND passenger_count < 3;
DELETE FROM transportation_data WHERE city = 'New York' AND mode_of_transport = 'Subway';
DELETE FROM transportation_patterns WHERE start_time <= '08:00:00' AND end_time >= '17:00:00';
DELETE FROM historic_routes WHERE route_name = 'Route A';
DELETE FROM TravelData WHERE travel_date = '2022-10-15' AND passenger_count < 10;
